ThingDef.label: Sandbags
ThingDef.description: A sandbag barrier that provides cover from gunfire.

ThingDef.label: Parapet
ThingDef.description: A waist-high stone wall built for defense.

ThingDef.label: Cheval de Frise
ThingDef.description: A defensive barier made of sharpened sticks. It is weak but slow to climb over.

ThingDef.label: Embrasure
ThingDef.description: A waist-high stone wall built for defense.

ThingDef.label: Barbed Wire
ThingDef.description: A cheap and easy defence system that is impassable.

ThingDef.label: Shallow Moat
ThingDef.description: A light perimeter defense to slow down your enemy.

ThingDef.label: Deadfall Trap
ThingDef.description: A suspended spiked weight held up by a delicate trigger. When the victim disturbs the trigger, the weight is released and falls on his head or torso.

ThingDef.label: IED Trap
ThingDef.description: aThe IED Trap is an explosive mortar shell that is connected to a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the trigger, the shell explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow an nimble enemy to escape.

ThingDef.label: IED Napalm Trap
ThingDef.description: The IED Napalm Trap is flammable Napalm that is connected with a homemade trigger. When someone disturbs the chemical trigger, it ignites burning fuel that sprays. Since it doesn't need to detonate high exposives, the chemical trigger is simple and more reliable than others.

ThingDef.label: Automated Sentry Turret
ThingDef.description: A simple turret gun that can automatically fire a burst of 3 bullets at nearby enemies. It requires 800 W to function and does not need ammo. The turret explodes when damaged.

ThingDef.label: 14.5mm Heavy MG Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned, mounted 14.5mm M2 Browning Heavy Machine Gun. It uses 14.5mmx15 MG Bullets for ammo and fires in a 15 round burst.

ThingDef.label: 35mm Autocannon Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned turret mounted with a 35mm Autocannon. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 35mmx3 Autocannon Shells for ammo. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: 30mm Avenger Fire Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned turret mounted with a GAU-8 Avenger Fire Cannon that shoots at enemies. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. It uses 30mmx8 Avenger Shells for ammo. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: 20mm Vulcan Cannon Turret
ThingDef.description: A fortified tower with a mounted 20mm Vulcan Cannon. It requires 800 W to function. It fires a quick, continuous stream of 20 bullets. Its high placement allows for a much longer range, but unfortunately due to that it can't aim directly down or close to itself and can't be placed indoors. It creates a sizable explosion when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: 80mm Incendiary Mortar Launcher
ThingDef.description: The 80mm Incendiary Mortar Launcher fires 80mm Incendiary Mortar Shells long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. It must be manned and will explode when damaged too much.

ThingDef.label: 80mm Explosive Mortar Launcher
ThingDef.description: The 80mm Explosive Mortar Launcher fires 80mm Explosive Mortar Shells long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. It must be manned and will explode when damaged too much.

ThingDef.label: 80mm EMP Mortar Launcher
ThingDef.description: The 80mm EMP Mortar Launcher fires 80mm EMP Mortar Shells long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. It must be manned and will explode when damaged too much.

ThingDef.label: Grenade Launcher Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned 30mm Grenade Launcher mounted on a turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL Turret Grenades for ammo. It fires a burst of 6 explosive grenades over medium distances.

ThingDef.label: 80mm EMP Mortar Launcher
ThingDef.description: The 80mm EMP Mortar Launcher fires 80mm EMP Mortar Shells to support defence against Mechanoids. It can fire over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: Laser Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned turret with a laser weapon mounted on the top. It sets targets on fire and deals damage as well. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. Requires 2,500 W to function and does not need ammo.

ThingDef.label: Precision Laserbeam Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned, highly calibrated gun turret with advanced optics. This allows it to deliver a single but precise laserbeam at fairly long distances. Requires 3,500 W to function and does not need ammo.

ThingDef.label: Plasma Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned plasma gun mounted on a turret. It fires a rapid burst of 20 plasma bolts. The turret will explode when damaged. It requires 2,800 W to function and does not need ammo.

ThingDef.label: .50cal Anti-Materiel Turret
ThingDef.description: A manned turret mounted with a .50cal Anti-Materiel gun. It deals armor-piercing damage. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses .50calx6 AM Turret Rounds for ammo.

ThingDef.label: 120mm Tank Cannon Turret
ThingDef.description: A turret mounted with a 120mm tank gun. It can fire an explosive shell long distances, over walls and through constructed roofs. The turret will explode when heavily damaged. It uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo.

ThingDef.label: 155mm Howitzer Cannon Turret
ThingDef.description: A turret mounted with a 155mm Howitzer Cannon. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged. It uses 155mm Howitzer Shells for ammo.

ThingDef.label: Devastator Magnetic Catapult
ThingDef.description: The Devastator Magnetic Catapult launches a projectile with greater velocity, higher accuracy and ultimately a much larger blast radius. Requires 3,000 W to function. It uses Magnetic Shells for ammo. It creates a huge explosion when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: Light Missile System
ThingDef.description: The Light Missile System fires 1 missile at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: Medium Missile System
ThingDef.description: The Medium Missile System fires 3 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: Heavy Missile System
ThingDef.description: The Heavy Missile System fires 6 missiles at a target area with each volley. Fires over walls and needs to be manned. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: 35mm Automated Autocannon Turret
ThingDef.description: The 35mm Automated Autocannon Turret automatically fires at enemies. It requires 1,500 W to function and does not need ammo. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit. The turret explodes when heavily damaged.

ThingDef.label: Nanite Shield Station
ThingDef.description: Supplies and recharges Nanite Shield Modulators on colonists to protect them from injury.
